price: 55.Tokkel Nabiyow munaafiqhiin maalih mangaa kee ken xayloh manga massakaatin, cagalah Yalli keenih yeceemit addunyâ manol ken digaalam faxak, ken roocitte usun koroosannut anuk tawqemkeh.
arabic: فَلَا تُعۡجِبۡكَ أَمۡوَٰلُهُمۡ وَلَآ أَوۡلَٰدُهُمۡۚ إِنَّمَا يُرِيدُ ٱللَّهُ لِيُعَذِّبَهُم بِهَا فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَا وَتَزۡهَقَ أَنفُسُهُمۡ وَهُمۡ كَٰفِرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: falā tuʿ'jib'ka amwāluhum walā awlāduhum innamā yurīdu al-lahu liyuʿadhibahum bihā fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā watazhaqa anfusuhum wahum kāfirūna
